attributes.action: listen to the huge number of people who signed the road pricing petition. We have read the email reply and we still want you to scrap the proposal to charge for car journeys.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Almost 2 million people signed the petition against road pricing. They received an email reply. Has the reply addressed your concerns about it?
It has not changed my mind. 
The government should listen to the people. The road pricing proposal is extremely unpopular and should be scrapped.
Do they not realise that the reason people drive in rush hour is because they are going to work? No-one drives in rush hour for fun.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
